## âœ… Checklist

*   [ ] I have read and followed the contributing guidelines.

*   [ ] I have added/updated tests to cover my changes.

*   [ ] My changes introduce no breaking changes (or if they do, they are clearly documented).
*   [ ] My changes are well-documented (code comments, README updates if necessary).
